title: CENTRAL AND WEST ASIA
content: Afghanistan, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Kazakhstan, the Kyrgyz Republic, Pakistan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan

title: EAST ASIA
content: The People’s Republic of China, Mongolia

title: PACIFIC
content: The Cook Islands, Fiji, Kiribati, the Marshall Islands, the Federated States of Micronesia, Nauru, Niue, Palau, Papua New Guinea, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Timor-Leste, Tonga, Tuvalu, Vanuatu

title: SOUTH ASIA
content: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Sri Lanka

title: SOUTHEAST ASIA
content: Cambodia, Indonesia, the Lao People’s Democratic Republic, Malaysia, Myanmar, the Philippines, Thailand, Viet Nam
